rules_text:
{W}{U} REVELATIONS Witness the majesty of the ascendant by turning your small creatures and spells into powerful combinations!
{U}{B} SABOTEURS Predate the night by slinking past your opponent's blockers and going for the life total directly.
{B}{R} AURORA CONTROL Play the long game as you remove threats, cast off-color spells and accrue value until your aurora is complete.
{R}{G} AURORA MIDRANGE Beat your opponent down with on-curve threats then boost them all with your aurora!
{G}{W} ABILITY COUNTERS Have your creatures share their abilities for the good of the collective as you capitalize off different counters.
{W}{B} +1/+1 COUNTERS Scavenge the flesh of the dead to grow your threats. Your opponent's life total is next!
{B}{G} GO-WIDE Grow your board before you infect them all with a fungal buff to swing for lethal.
{G}{U} LANDS Put lands in your graveyard and onto the battlefield to cast your huge threats faster!
{U}{R} SPELLSLINGER AGGRO Use elemental infusions to blast your opponent with spells before they can react.
{R}{W} BLINK Aetherize and reuse your powerful enters effects until nobody can compete with the value.
